descriptionHtml:
Im pretty much a noob to modding but i finally got this working.
It was requested by one of my freinds and so to make it easier to download im adding it on here.

He IS marriageable (as far as i know haven\'t fully tested him but it did give the option)

When (IF) i get better at moding ima add a quest for him to find \'sir-pounce-alot\'.

im Also planning on adding a Zevran, and more =3

note;with apachiis new hair update ill be adding that hair to him xD (also i belive i have figured out the gray face problem and will be fixing it soon!) (hopefully)
author: ScarletSkye
